mdRecord.dcterms:title: Les reports de Sir Gefrey Palmer, chevalier & baronet .. [1619-1629]: Imprime & publie per l'original. Ovesque deux tables, l'un des nosmes des cases, l'auter des principal matters conteinus en yceux
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed by the assigns of R. and E. Atkyns, for Robert Pawlet
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Signatures: frontispiece, 2 leaves unsigned, B-Z², Aa-Ll⁴, Aaa-Zzz², Aaaa-Zzzz², 5A-5Z⁴, 6A-6G⁴, 6H².
The frontispiece is an engraved protrait of Palmer by R. White.
Impressions 1678, 1688, 172l, identical, except in date. cf. Soule, Lawyer's ref. manual, 1884.
"A catalogue of books printed for, and sold by Robert Pawlet": [1] p. at end.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Law reports, digests, etc--Great Britain
